mapper.select: select id, code,dispatchTime,totalCount, subject, price, beforeWarehouseId,(select name from base_storehouse where kd.beforeWarehouseId = base_storehouse.id) as beforeWareName, remark, approverBy,(select userName from sys_user where approverBy = userId) as approverName,approvalStatus, approverRemark, documenterBy, (select userName from sys_user where documenterBy = userId) as createName,voidState, createDate, updateDate, updateBy, (select userName from sys_user where kd.updateBy = userId) as updateName,orderStatus, (select type from order_statue where orderStatus = order_statue.id) as orderStatusResult, (select userName from sys_user where dispatchBy = userId) as dispatchName,dispatchBy from kc_dispatch kd where kd.id = #{id}

select kd.id, code,(select userName from sys_user where dispatchBy = userId) as dispatchName, subject, kd.price, beforeWarehouseId,(select name from base_storehouse where kd.beforeWarehouseId = base_storehouse.id) as beforeWareName, remark, approverBy,(select userName from sys_user where approverBy = userId) as approverName,approvalStatus, approverRemark, documenterBy, (select userName from sys_user where documenterBy = userId) as createName,voidState, createDate, updateDate, updateBy, (select userName from sys_user where kd.updateBy = userId) as updateName,orderStatus, (select type from order_statue where orderStatus = order_statue.id) as orderStatusResult, kt.medicineId as medicineIdTemp,(select base_medicine.specification from base_medicine where medicineId = base_medicine.id) as specification, (select (select name from base_medicine_category where categoryId = base_medicine_category.id) from base_medicine where medicineId = base_medicine.id) as categoryName, kt.quantity, (select (select name from base_unit where unitId = base_unit.id) from base_medicine where medicineId = base_medicine.id) as unitName, kt.price as purchasePrice,(select name from base_medicine where kt.medicineId = base_medicine.id) as name from kc_dispatch kd,kc_dispatchdetails kt where kd.code = kt.dispatchCode
